meanings.sent1: The artist used ultramarines to create a beautiful sky in the painting.
meanings.sent2: The ultramarines in the palette added a pop of color to the artwork.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child accidentally spilled ultramarines all over the floor, creating a blue mess.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like ultramarines in the sunlight, mesmerizing everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The ultramarines on the canvas seemed to glow with an otherworldly radiance.

meanings.definition: A member of the Ultramarines, a fictional group of superhuman soldiers in the Warhammer 40,000 universe.
meanings.sent1: The Ultramarines bravely fought against the alien invaders to protect humanity.
meanings.sent2: In the game, players can choose to control an Ultramarines character with special abilities.
meanings.sent3: During the cosplay event, many fans dressed up as Ultramarines, wielding foam weapons.
meanings.sent4: He admired the Ultramarines for their unwavering loyalty and dedication to their cause.
meanings.sent5: The Ultramarines stood tall and proud, ready to defend their allies against any threat.
